mapper.insert: insert into board(writter, title, content) values(#{writter}, #{title}, #{content})

mapper.insert: insert into uploadedFile(originalFileName, newFileName,size, boardNo, thumbFileName ) values(#{originalFileName}, #{newFileName}, #{size}, #{boardNo}, #{thumbFileName})
